text: Bryan D. Wood (born March 10, 1944) is a Canadian former curler. He was the lead on the Don Duguid rink that won two Curling Championships and two Brier Championships.http://www.curling.ca/hof/people/wood-bryan-d/ He also won the 1979 Macdonald Brier playing for Barry Fry. ==References== Category:Living people Category:Curlers from Manitoba Category:1944 births Category:Brier champions Category:World curling champions Category:Canadian male curlers
title: Bryan Wood (curler)
